discussion.title: Multi-objective search
discussion.body:
I have loss function, that contains 4 terms describing 4 different systems. While total loss seems fine, if one looks at each system individually the fit would be much worse in comparison to the result from only 2 terms ( if we compare two identical systems). 

It seems that multi objective optimization( pareto optimization ) is the solution.

Is it possible to use something like that? if not, will it be implemented in the near future?

nodes.body: Yes, the new `TemplateExpression` should help a lot with this kind of thing. Itâ€™s in the beta release now for SymbolicRegression. Unsure when or if I will make it available from PySR (since I think such flexibility would be incompatible with scikit-learn) but hopefully this will happen eventually.
